page.title: 01Population
page.content: { {Stubbington}centres around the old village green which is surrounded by a modern shopping centre with plenty of car parking space.The shops provide the local residents with the majority of basic requirements-food,domestic appliances,banking etc,.Since the second world war Stubbington has expanded into a large suburb.The bulk of homes built between the 1950's and 60's are bungalows.Recent developments to the west and north-west of the village consists of compact,energy saving homes,designed for easy maintainance. {The surrounding countryside}contains mainly cultivated high yield crops. There is also some dairy farming and a large number of market gardens.
